channel.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2024 Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Devastation in Gaza as Israel wages war on Hamas
item.description: US President Joe Biden has offered one of his sharpest rebukes of Israel's handling of the war in Gaza, describing Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's approach as a "mistake" and calling for a halt to the fighting. Follow for live updates.

item.title: April 9, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: US President Joe Biden offered one of his sharpest rebukes of Israel's handling of the war, describing Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's approach as a "mistake" and calling for a halt to the fighting.

item.title: Parents of Michigan school shooter sentenced
item.description: Jennifer and James Crumbley, the parents of Michigan high school shooter Ethan Crumbley, were sentenced to 10-15 years in prison after being found guilty of involuntary manslaughter.

item.title: For nearly 50 years, only Black men caddied The Masters. One day, they all but vanished
item.description: Augusta National's original caddie corps were all Black men, mostly from the local Sand Hills district. For decades, the played an integral part in The Masters, but the introduction of "Tour caddies" saw most of them disappear from the major.

item.title: The haunting Masters meltdown that changed Rory McIlroy's career
item.description: Rory McIlroy returns to the Masters once again seeking to complete the grand slam, 12 years on from his devastating collapse at Augusta.

item.title: Why do Masters champions win a green jacket?
item.description: Augusta National's green jacket -- an exclusive prize for Masters champions -- is golf's most coveted fashion statement, and one of sport's most iconic pieces of clothing.

item.title: Why caddies wear white jumpsuits at the Masters
item.description: The sights and colors of the Masters are what make the premier golf tournament so distinctive.

item.title: American Politician Plane Fatalities Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's American Politican Plane Fatalities Fast Facts for a list of prominent American politicians killed in plane crashes.

item.title: The 10 most bizarre golf courses in the world
item.description: From naked golfers to shark-infested water hazards, these are some of the weirdest courses from around the world.

item.title: April 8, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Monday that a time for an invasion into Rafah, where an estimated 1.5 million Palestinians are sheltering, has been set, but he didn't give a date.

item.title: Total solar eclipse 2024
item.description: A total solar eclipse, which was experienced Monday by millions of skygazers in parts of Mexico, the United States and Canada, has concluded its path over North America.

item.title: America gets ready for the total solar eclipse
item.description: A total solar eclipse will put on a dramatic show tomorrow as it crosses over Mexico, the United States and Canada.

item.title: April 7, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Israel says it has withdrawn its forces from Khan Younis in southern Gaza, but that a "significant" force remains elsewhere in the strip.

item.title: April 6, 2024 Israel-Gaza news
item.description: World Central Kitchen and some Western leaders are calling for an independent investigation into an Israeli strike that killed seven of the group's aid workers in Gaza. Follow for live updates.

item.title: April 5, 2024 Israel-Gaza updates
item.description: Israel dismisses two military officers as a military report says "mistaken identification" and "serious violations" of standard procedure led to the deadly attack on World Central Kitchen staff in Gaza on Monday. Follow for live updates.

item.title: Rare 4.8 magnitude quake rattles Northeast
item.description: An earthquake rattled buildings across parts of the Northeast Friday morning, with reports of it being felt from Philadelphia to New York City.

item.title: Biden visits Baltimore to assess bridge collapse damage
item.description: President Joe Biden visited Baltimore to survey damage from last week's collapse of the Francis Scott Key Bridge. He met with local officials and some of the relatives of the six construction workers who died.

item.title: Stocks end the day higher even as blowout jobs report pushes some Fed officials to consider another rate hike
item.description: The March jobs report showed the US economy added 303,000 positions and the unemployment rate fell to 3.8%. That far surpassed expectations for 205,000 jobs to be added, underscoring the ongoing resilience of the US labor market.

item.title: 2024 Atlantic Hurricane Season Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's 2024 Atlantic Hurricane Season Fast Facts to learn about tropical storm systems that develop during the summer and fall.

item.title: Devastation in Gaza as Israel wages war on Hamas
item.description: US President Joe Biden told Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in a call Thursday that the overall humanitarian situation in Gaza and deaths of aid workers due to Israeli strikes are "unacceptable." Follow here for live updates.

item.title: Boston Marathon Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts about the Boston Marathon, which is an annual marathon starting in Hopkinton, Massachusetts, and ending at the Boston Public Library.

item.title: Jack Nicholson Fast Facts
item.description: View Jack Nicholson's Fast Facts at CNN and learn more about the Academy Award winning actor.

item.title: Hundreds stranded after deadly 7.4 magnitude quake hits Taiwan
item.description: Rescue teams are trying to reach more than 700 people stranded in eastern Taiwan following the strongest earthquake to hit the island in decades.

item.title: Today's news in 10 minutes
item.description: April 5, 2024

item.title: Syrian Civil War Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts on Syria's Civil War to learn about the on-going conflict, the escalating refugee crisis.

item.title: April 3, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The Israeli airstrike that killed seven aid workers delivering food to civilians in Gaza has prompted global outrage. Follow for live news updates.

item.title: 7.4 magnitude quake hits Taiwan, strongest in 25 years
item.description: A major earthquake has hit the east coast of Taiwan with a magnitude of 7.4, the strongest on the island in 25 years.

item.title: Pete Rose Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts about Pete Rose and learn about the former Cincinnati Reds player and manager who was banned for life from baseball for gambling.

item.title: Oklahoma City Bombing Fast Facts
item.description: Read Fast Facts from CNN about the bombing of the Alfred P. Murrah Federal Building in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, on April 19, 1995.

item.title: Antony Blinken Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts on US Secretary of State Antony Blinken.
